excludeAirlines.description: Airline codes for airlines which should not be processed (ex. cargo airlines like FX)

chaseUnsupportedAirlines.description: Chase Ultimate Rewards only supports some airlines for booking cash fares, list the ones it doesn't here (ex. WN)

airlineGroups.description: Group name to array of airlines mapping (ex. for use with an airline alliance)

saverBookingClasses.description: Booking classes list for each airline which should be considered saver fares (and bookable using partners' miles). Supports airlineGroups.

podsAircraft.description: Substrings of aircraft names to assume have lie-flat seats in Business (ex. 'A321'). Use '*' to match all aircrafts by the carrier.

wifiAircraft.description: Substrings of aircraft names to assume have wifi (ex. 'A321'). Use '*' to match all aircrafts by the carrier.

disabled.description: Disables the scraper from being selected

supportedAirlines.description: Codes of the airlines which this scraper searches (ex. 'UA')

nativeAirline.description: Code of the airline which this scraper naturally searches. Results with this ariline will not be assumed to be saver awards.

cashOnlyFares.description: Set this to true to have this scraper be called for all airlines and to convert all fares on a cents-per-mile basis
